casebody.data:
PHARMARESEARCH CORPORATION
v.
James M. MASH. No. 215P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. R. Jay Short, Jr., Reidsville, Randolph (Tre') Morgan, III, Wilmington, for Mash. Pressly M. Millen, Raleigh, for Pharmaresearch Corp.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 24th day of May 2004 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
